    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuHeader

        public MenuHeader(java.lang.String name,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Default constructor for a MenuHeader. Creates a new MenuHeader and sets its name, coordinates and dimensions and initializes its DropDownMenu.
        Parameters:
        name - the name for this header.
        x - the x pos of this header.
        y - the y pos of this header.
        width - the width of the header.
        height - the height of the header.
